Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan zōhr abar māhrōy ud barsom nihādan ud pad harw š́iiaōϑənanąm frāztar burdan ō sar ī barsom ud pad sidīgar yaθā ahū vairiiō frāztar burdan ō sar ī barsom

"(The zōt) should recite four times the yaθā ahū vairiiō and put the zōhr on the māhrōy and barsom. At each š́iiaōϑənanąm, he should bring it further forward towards the end of the barsom. During the third yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should bring it further forward towards the end of the barsom."

Ritual.ab: Cf. N52.9 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p. 238-9; Cantera, 2014: p. 228 f.)
u-š tā ō xšaθrəmcā ī sidīgar pad war ī zōhrag dārišn u-š *pad xšaθrəmcā ī sidīgar [[ō]] abāz ō barsom āwarišn u-š pas ō dast ī zōt dahišn
Until the third xšaθrəmcā, he has to hild (the zōhr)by the side of the zōhrag. Until at third xšaθrəmcā,he has to bring it away from the barsom and give it to the hand of the zōt.
